review: The chromecast works perfectly fine and does exactly what I thought it would do. The only complaint I have with it and the reason it is getting 4 starts is because sometimes, the connection will drop or it takes a long time for my phone to connect to the device causing it appear frozen for a long time until I go back into the app or restart the connection. Other than that, it does what i need it to do. I have watch netflix and youtube on my tv from my phone or my laptop. It's great little product and well worth the $25 I spent on it!
